Information about this business ( 2 )
; KFC is a chicken restaurant chain that specializes in original recipe. Extra crispy. Kentucky grilled chicken and original recipe strips. Based in oakland. Calif. . The Company offers honey barbeque wings and chicken sandwiches. Including the double down and the DOUBLICIOUS. It operates more than 5.200 restaurants in the united states and more than 15.000 outlets in 109 countries and...
Posted on June 02, 2011. Brought to you by yellowpages .

Editorial reviews from the web ( 3 )
Citysearch Average Rating 70 For more than 60 years, this all-American institution has been serving its signature chicken and home-style sides.
Posted by Citysearch on January 04, 2012. Brought to you by urbanspoon .
For more than 60 years, this all-American institution has been serving its signature chicken and home-style sides.
In Short Established in 1939, this fast-food restaurant still makes its legendary fried chicken with the closely guarded blend of 11 herbs and spices originally created by founder Colonel...
Posted by by Contributor at Citysearch on June 23, 2008. Brought to you by Citysearch . View all 3 reviews Other reviews from the web ( 5 )
Store is dying
I am sad that this store is losing its cutomer base. I went there and no chicken pie. The lady say that i should go to another KFC. I went to this store and found that other stores were honoring fry chicken wings, and she did not know it.The pie wasd out a few times, not once or twice, but it seems that there's no pie.I went to order 4 chicken pot pie and there was a wait. Then she tells me...
Posted by gordonyow on June 02, 2011. Brought to you by yellowpages . Average Rating 100 The grilled chicken isn't junk food, and this is a good deal - a leg and a thigh for 99 cents. They've been offering it every Tuesday for months.
Posted by A Google User on June 15, 2010. Brought to you by googleplus . View all 5 reviews Business description ( 2 )
The inside of this Kentucky Fried Chicken is streamlined so you can go in, order and come out as soon as possible. This is good because this particular Kentucky Fried Chicken has a tendency to get crowded during the lunch and dinner hours.Although seating is limited to counter space on the inside, one can find sit down seating on the outside of the store. There is also a free parking lot behind...
Posted on June 20, 2011. Brought to you by patch .
Every day, nearly eight million customers are served around the world. KFC's menu includes Original Recipe® chicken -- made with the same great taste Colonel Harland Sanders created more than a half-century ago. Customers around the globe also enjoy more than 300 other products -- from a Chunky Chicken Pot Pie in the United States to a salmon sandwich in Japan.
KFC has more than 11,000...
Posted on October 02, 2010. Brought to you by contracostatimes .

Save Time
Call ahead to place your picnic orders and you'll avoid the inevitable weekend wait time.
